title: Guess who! Australian model shares adorable childhood throwback
description: An iconic Australian model has shared an adorable throwback photo from her childhood, sending her fans into meltdown.
content:
An iconic Australian model has shared an adorable throwback photo from her childhood, sending her fans into meltdown.

The brunette beauty, 35, is preparing to welcome her first child, a baby girl, and was feeling particularly nostalgic on Thursday as she posted a photo of herself wearing an adorable black-and-red party dress for a Christmas happy snap.

In her caption she wrote: 'There will be another little girl wearing this dress in a few years. Can’t believe my mum kept my little party dress for over 30 years, it was meant to be,' she wrote.

The glamazon's career would launch just a few years after the photo was taken, as at age 13 she would win the Girlfriend Covergirl modelling competition and shoot to fame.

At age 19, she became the second Indigenous model to appear on the cover of Vogue Australia, and has since appeared in campaigns for leading brands including David Jones and Seafolly.

The former Dancing With The Stars contestant, whose mother is Aboriginal and father is German-English, also uses her platform to champion diversity, body positivity, and greater Indigenous representation in fashion.

So, have you guessed who she is yet?

The girl in the photo is none other than Samantha Harris!

The 6ft model, who hails from Tweed Heads, announced in May she is expecting her first child with husband of eleven years Luke Hunt.

That model made headlines in 2014 when she famously stuck by her beau's side after he was sentenced to four years in prison.

Luke served two years behind bars for the death of a grandfather following a fatal car crash in 2012.

Sam secretly married Luke in 2014, two months before he began serving his prison sentence for his involvement in the crash that caused the death of 78-year-old grandfather Kenneth Lay.

News that the couple had married wasn't revealed until April 2016, after her husband had finished serving his prison term.
summary: Australian model Samantha Harris, a 35-year-old model, has shared an adorable throwback photo from her childhood showing her wearing a black-and-red party dress. The model, whose mother is Aboriginal and father is German-English, is preparing to welcome her first child, a baby girl. She first gained fame at age 13 and has since appeared on the cover of Vogue Australia at age 19. Harris also campaigns for brands like David Jones and Seafolly. Her husband, Luke Hunt, served two years in prison for his role in a fatal car crash in 2012.
shortSummary: Australian model Samantha Harris shared an adorable childhood photo of herself in a party dress, celebrating her upcoming child and promoting diversity.

argos_summary: Australian model Samantha Harris shared a nostalgic throwback photo from her childhood as she prepares to welcome her first child, a baby girl. The 35-year-old, who has had a successful modeling career, expressed her excitement about her mother preserving her childhood party dress for over 30 years. Harris also reflected on her journey in the modeling industry and her commitment to supporting Indigenous representation and education.
